title: Le Pain Quotidien - Sablon
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Mediterranean, Take-out, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Belgian-based international restaurant chain featuring fresh artisan bakery and communal table. Each section of the menu includes at least one vegan option, clearly labelled on the ,enu (e.g. rice milk porridge for breakfast, home made cashew chease, vegan brunch).
